name: Awesome Turkey Hunting Shooting Game By Top Gun Sniper Hunt Games For Boys FREE
name_original: Awesome Turkey Hunting Shooting Game By Top Gun Sniper Hunt Games For Boys FREE
description:
BEST HUNTING FPS GAME EVER!!!

+++You'll be ADDICTED for sure!!!+++

Choose from a variety of different guns and see how good your aim is as you hunt a dinner favorite, TURKEY!!! You may think you are ready for the challenge, but, watch out! It is more challenging than it looks!

1) Collect 4 Awesome Riffles
2) Aim like a real Turkey Hunter
3) Use Maximum Fire Power
4) Hunt, Shoot, and Have Fun!!

If you like hunting and sniper games, then this game is guaranteed to keep you entertained for hours!

Download and play today!!!
